question: I need to buy a car. Albaraka Bank's pre-Requisites I cannot meet as I do not have so much to put down as deposit. will it be permissible to take a bank loan on interest?
answer:
QUESTION
I only have a 10% deposit for a car that's R50000. Is there any one other bank that will assist me without interest besides Albaraka ?
ANSWER


Share:
It is not permissible to take an interest bearing loan.

We are not aware of any bank that will offer you an interest free loan.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
